item.title: Navigating the Challenges: A Candid Reflection on E&B and the PMS Struggle
item.description: It is unfortunate that E&B charges me the same amount of money as someone who advertises 7 days a week. It’s not the most efficient platform for those who only work occasionally. I’d be wasting someone else’s time, and I wouldn’t gain anything by keeping my ad on 24/7, so I don’t see the point. Anyway, it’s only $20 a week, so no hard feelings! I’ve been searching for a new platform with innovative ideas for several years now but haven’t had any luck.
